Save the Rocky Mountain Tree Trout

Elusive. Arboreal. Surprisingly good at climbing. The Rocky Mountain Tree Trout depends on our forests for habitat—and our very loud, slightly dramatic voices—for protection.

Quick links to the good stuff—dive deeper on each page.

Origin, traits, ecology, and evolution of the tree trout.
